title: Flowers Are Bait - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Awkward Protagonist   Bickering Couple   Character Growth   Clingy Lover   Coma   Contracts   Couple Growth   Crime   Cruel Characters   Enemies Become Lovers   Evil Organizations   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Murders   Mysterious Past   Obsessive Love   Organized Crime   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Possessive Characters   R-18   Revenge   Strong Love Interests   Tomboyish Female Lead   Tragic Past   Yandere
author: Dried Ladies   Lachik De   라치크
description:
There was a special patient in Spruce Hospital. A person in vegetative state and coma that the tree doctor, So Lee-yeon, has been hiding for two years…

‘Don’t wake up. Please don’t wake up.’

It was her dream to live quietly so she prayed every night. Then one day, by pure miracle or failure, the person in vegetative state woke up!

“Did you come to suck this poor bastard’s dick?”

In front of the man that lost his memory and common sense, she told a lie that couldn’t be turned as she was afraid of his murderous instinct.

“I’m your w-wife, Kwon Chae-woo.”

To the man who buried someone alive and tried to kill her two years ago!>
